property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: description
property.value: This accessor uses the dump1090 driver to access a Software-Defined Radio such as the NooElec R820T (http://www.nooelec.com/store/sdr/sdr-receivers/nesdr-mini-rtl2832-r820t.html) in order to receive and parse ADS-B messages. ADS-B is a cooperative surveillance technology in which an aircraft determines its position via satellite navigation and periodically broadcasts it, enabling it to be tracked.

property.name: an (port)
property.value: array of objects containing the aircraft information
